00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Linq;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 using Utilities.Cisco.Interfaces;
00028 #endregion
00029 
00030 namespace Utilities.Cisco
00031 {
00035     public class Image:IDisplay
00036     {
00037         #region Constructor
00038 
00042         public Image()
00043         {
00044             SoftKeys = new List<SoftKeyItem>();
00045         }
00046 
00047         #endregion
00048 
00049         #region Properties
00050 
00054         public string Title { get; set; }
00055 
00059         public string Prompt { get; set; }
00060 
00064         public int X { get; set; }
00065 
00069         public int Y { get; set; }
00070 
00074         public string URL { get; set; }
00075 
00079         public List<SoftKeyItem> SoftKeys { get; set; }
00080 
00081         #endregion
00082 
00083         #region Overridden Functions
00084 
00085         public override string ToString()
00086         {
00087             try
00088             {
00089                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00090                 Builder.Append("<CiscoIPPhoneImageFile><Title>").Append(Title).Append("</Title><Prompt>").Append(Prompt).Append("</Prompt><LocationX>")
00091                     .Append(X.ToString()).Append("</LocationX><LocationY>").Append(Y.ToString()).Append("</LocationY><URL>")
00092                     .Append(URL).Append("</URL>");
00093                 foreach (SoftKeyItem Item in SoftKeys)
00094                 {
00095                     Builder.Append(Item.ToString());
00096                 }
00097                 Builder.Append("</CiscoIPPhoneImageFile>");
00098                 return Builder.ToString();
00099             }
00100             catch { throw; }
00101         }
00102 
00103         #endregion
00104     }
00105 }
